name: Arcane Array Arena
description:
Arcane Array Arena is a rogue-like unit placement auto-battle game where you summon items in a magic circle and shoot them against your opponent.
Create your own unique item builds, compose the most powerful deployment, and defeat your opponents!

The game is divided into two main phases: the purchase phase and the competition phase. You purchase items at the store and place them in the magic circle. When you are ready, the battle begins!
The battle method is asynchronous, so you can fight at your own convenience.

A variety of items exist and can be divided into several categories!
Synergy between items and their placement is the key to success!
